Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: レンパオ
Entry.EnglishText: Lenpao

Entry.JapaneseText: レンパオ
Entry.EnglishText: Lenpao

Entry.JapaneseText: どうした、<Eugene>？
Entry.EnglishText: What's the matter, <Eugene>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……彼女は今、かなり 危険な状態だ……
Entry.EnglishText: That girl is in a dangerous predicament...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここでの慣れない生活と、 フォルスの訓練によって、 精神的な疲労がたまっている。
Entry.EnglishText: She's mentally exhausted from living in an unfamiliar place and having to practice with her Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: その事で精神が乱れ、高揚し、 フォルスを不安定な状態に しているんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: This is wreaking havok on her mental state and making her Force unstable...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか……暴走か!?
Entry.EnglishText: You mean she might... go berserk?!

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……ギリギリのところだ。 一刻も早く、彼女の心を 落ち着かせなくては……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... She's on the precipice. She needs to be calmed down as soon as possible.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鎮魂錠……鎮魂錠なら、 彼女の心を静める事が できるはずです！
Entry.EnglishText: The Requiem Pastille... Perhaps if we had one of those, then we could help her soul be at ease!

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、あれはラジルダの秘薬よ。 ラジルダが沈んだ今、どこに あるっていうの？
Entry.EnglishText: But that's the miracle drug of Razilda. Now that Razilda's sunk, where are we going to find any?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そうですけど……でも、 早くしないとニノンさんは…… 数日のうちに暴走を……
Entry.EnglishText: You're right on that... But if we don't do something fast, then Ninon could go berserk in the coming days.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんとかして、 鎮魂錠を探そう。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Let's go search for a Requiem Pastille.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちが手に入れたように、 他にも持っている人がいるかも しれない……
Entry.EnglishText: There may be other who got their hands on some like we did...

Entry.JapaneseText: 必ずどこかにある。 見つけるしかない……！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure there's some around. We just have to search for it...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、このまま放っておけば、 ニノンは暴走しちまうんだろ？ だったら探すしかないぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, if we do nothing about this, then Ninon will lose control. We have no choice but to go looking.

Entry.JapaneseText: 時間がない。急ごう！
Entry.EnglishText: We don't have much time. Let's hurry!

Entry.JapaneseText: おお、みんな見てくれ！ アカダマダケが生えてるぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, hey look everyone! There are Amber Jewels growing here!

Entry.JapaneseText: ニノンさん、 栽培に成功したんだネ！
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like Ninon was able to cultivate them!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、やるやる！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, she did a great job!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『アカダマダケ』 ニノンが育てた アカダマダケ。 とってもおいしい。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Amber Jewels - Amber Jewels that are being cultivated by Ninon. They're very delicious.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
